1.content:
You are on the verge of failing math class. You've tried everything but are unable to keep up with the work load. Not to mention you are constantly being distracted by your teacher Mrs.Myers. She is a pretty woman no totaly drop dead gorgous but still attractive however something you can't ignore is her ass. she has an amazing ass all the other students talk about it and it is a sight to behold. Like two watermelons squished in her tight khaki pants. Its every boys dream.
You are about to leave her class after another lecture that you slept through when you hear her call
"Hey can you stay with me after class? We really need to talk".
"Yes Ma'am" you reply.
Knowing its about your failing grades. The class has left and it's just you and her she looks you dead in the eyes you know what's about to come the "I'm going to have to call you're parents" type talk, but this one was different..
"I am going to be frank you are not going to pass this call unless you ace the final." she says sternly
"I have put in all the effort I can i just don't get this stuff." you reply
"Well I believe in you i think you just don't apply yourself."
"You might be right."
"I know I'm right. which is why I'm going to make a bet with you."
"Okay sounds cool."
"Good!" She says energetically "You'll pass my class either way it'll just be a lot more fun if you fail." She winks at you
"what does that mean?" you ask
"You'll see" she replies "Just sign this so that if you do fail we can do some tutoring."
"Tutoring??"
"yes it will be at my house and It'll last all summer long" She says with a devilish grin
you're very confused but you believe in yourself and she does too so you sign your name on the line but you have just doomed yourself you just don't know it yet.
It is the day of the test and it's the hardest test you've taken in you're life. they where like college level questions. You make it through but you have no confodence anymore that test was hell. One the last day of school Mrs.Myers calls you into her room again. You are scared for what she'll say. you enter the room shes at her desk with a huge grin.
"Well you..."
1.title: The Start

11.content:
"Passed! I knew you could do it!" she yells as she hugs you
"Thank you for the help Mrs.Myers!" you reply
You did it congradulations!
11.title: Passed

12.content:
"Failed. So I'll be seeing you tomorrow for tutoring." She says as she hands you a piece of paper with an address on it.
"What is this?" you ask
"The tutoring will be at my house you're the only one I'm tutoring this summer." She says with a smile
"Oh okay I'll see you tomorrow then." you say as you walk out
. The next day you arrive at her house. You knock on the door and Mrs.Myers opens the door. Your jaw drops as you see your teacher in her panties and a white t-shirt.
"It's about time you got here!" shes says grinning
you walk in and she sits you down on her couch.
"so what are we going to go over first?" you ask
"The deal we made." Shes says giggling
"What do you mean?"
She pulls out the paper you signed "You really need to read things before you sign them." she says laughing now.
"What do you mean?! What did I sign?!" you're getting scared now.
"Well to sum it all up you're going to be my booty slave for the rest of the summer." She says sensually and turning around to show you her ass giving it a nice hard slap as she does.
"WHAT?!" you yell.
She points to the paper on the line that says "I [your signature] will be a personal slave to Mrs.Myers upon failing the final"
"oh shit" you say trying to think of what to do next.
"Well my pet I'll let you pick the first thing we do. I'm feeling gassy so you're definitely going to swallow a fart or two." She says with a wink "We can make a dutch oven if you want to start off slow, Or maybe I'll go all out and try to break in the new gas mask I got!" She's getting excited now "Or maybe we'll use some good old fashion saran wrap and get you in this ass air tight!"
*BBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRTTTTTTTTT*
"whoops sorry I'm getting excited! What will it be my booty bitch?"
12.title: Failed
